products.title: SAP HANA Live for SAP Business Suite

sqlfunctions.deliverableTitle: SAP HANA SQL and System Views Reference
sqlfunctions.description: Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.
sqlfunctions.snippet: LOWER Function (String) Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.Syntax LOWER(<str>) Description Converts all characters in <str> to lowercase.The LOWER function is identical to the LCASE function.Example This example converts the given string AnT to lowercase, and returns the value ant: SELECT LOWER
sqlfunctions.title: LOWER Function (String)

sqlfunctions.deliverableTitle: SAP HANA SQL and System Views Reference
sqlfunctions.description: Converts all characters in a specified string to lowercase.
sqlfunctions.snippet: ABAP_LOWER Function (String) Converts all characters in a specified string to lowercase.Syntax ABAP_LOWER(<str>) Syntax Elements <str> The string to convert to lowercase.Description Converts all characters in the <str> parameter to lowercase.Example The following example converts the given string to lowercase and returns the value ant: SELECT
sqlfunctions.title: ABAP_LOWER Function (String)

sqlfunctions.deliverableTitle: SAP HANA SQL and System Views Reference
sqlfunctions.description: Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.
sqlfunctions.snippet: LCASE Function (String) Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.Syntax LCASE(<str>) Description Converts all characters in string <str> to lowercase.The LCASE function is identical to the LOWER function.Example This example converts all characters of the given string TesT to lowercase and returns the value
sqlfunctions.title: LCASE Function (String)

sqlfunctions.deliverableTitle: SAP HANA SQL and System Views Reference
sqlfunctions.description: Converts the first character of each word in a specified string to uppercase and converts remaining characters to lowercase.
sqlfunctions.snippet: INITCAP Function (String) Converts the first character of each word in a specified string to uppercaseand converts remaining characters to lowercase.Syntax INITCAP(<inputString>) Syntax Elements <inputString> Specifies the string to be converted.
sqlfunctions.title: INITCAP Function (String)

workflows.deliverableTitle: Employee Central Workflows: Implementation and Administration
workflows.description: By delegating your workflows, you forward your workflows to another user in the company so that they can approve or decline the workflows on your behalf. You can enable automatic delegation where all your workflows are automatically delegated to a specific user, for example, your assistant or another member of your team.
workflows.snippet: Delegating Workflows Automatically By delegating your workflows, you forward your workflows to anotherYou can enable automatic delegation where all your workflows are automatically delegated to a specificContext In addition to delegating all your workflows automatically, you can also delegate an individualAfter a workflow request is manually or automatically delegated, you can still withdraw the delegationResults All your workflows will be automatically delegated to the selected user.
workflows.title: Delegating Workflows Automatically

workflows.deliverableTitle: Employee Central Workflows: Implementation and Administration
workflows.description: The default length of alert messages is 255 characters. To be able to define a longer text for the alert messages, extend the field length to 4000.
workflows.snippet: Extending Maximum Length of Alert Messages The default length of alert messages is 255 characters.To be able to define a longer text for the alert messages, extend the field length to 4000.Procedure Go to Admin Center  Configure Object Definition and edit the Alert Message object.Change the field length to 4000 for the following fields: alertDescription Message description fieldResults The field length for the alert messages has been extended.
workflows.title: Extending Maximum Length of Alert Messages

workflows.deliverableTitle: Employee Central Workflows: Implementation and Administration
workflows.description: The Document Generation feature enables you to create and manage custom documents, including workflow email templates, where you can flexibly define and include text and even images. Being able to create and assign templates more flexibly, you can customize the notification text for different participant types.
workflows.snippet: Creating Custom Templates with Document Generation The Document Generation feature enables you to createBeing able to create and assign templates more flexibly, you can customize the notification text fortemplates using Document Generation.Create a Document Generation Template and associate it with the group you have created.as custom templates.
workflows.title: Creating Custom Templates with Document Generation
